title: Collapse duplicate schemas in `anyOf`
description: Redundant branches inside `anyOf` add noise without changing validation results.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: anyOf has two identical branches
comprehensiveExamples.description: Duplicated alternatives add noise without changing validation.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: anyOf branches that accept the same instances
comprehensiveExamples.description: Two branches are redundant when they allow the same set of values.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: anyOf with distinct constraints
comprehensiveExamples.description: Distinct branches that expand the accepted set are appropriate.

message: Remove duplicate schemas; keep one representative branch.
